      • getCanonicalizedURI

        public static URI getCanonicalizedURI(URI uri)
        If URI is the SIP URI, method returns its clone without any parameters, otherwise original URI is returned without any modifications.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI
        Returns:
        Canonicalized URI ( without parameters )

      • getKeyToLocationService

        public static java.lang.String getKeyToLocationService(Request request)
        Parameters:
        request - Original request
        Returns:
        The key value to use with location service database. Key is needed to find current location of subscriber specified in To header of request. Returns null if To header is not SIP URI like.

      • getKeyToLocationService

        public static java.lang.String getKeyToLocationService(URI uri)
        Parameters:
        uri - URI to make key value from.
        Returns:
        The key value to use with location service database. Key is needed to find current location of subscriber by uri. Returns null if uri is not SIP URI like.
